about_the_game:
Can you escape from Puzzledorf, the land of puzzles? This world is full of vibrant, block-pushing puzzles where simplicity meets surprising solutions. The game will help teach you how to solve puzzles as you go; a puzzle game for everyone.

Includes:

  • Solve puzzle mazes by pushing blocks

  • Match the correct colours

  • Colour blind options

  • Undo Mistakes

  • Mirror Mode

  • Classic block-pushing + Ice sliding puzzles

  • Steam Achievements and Local High Scores

  • Cloud Saves on Steam (Play on any PC and continue where you last played)

  • Different bright, colourful worlds

  • Relaxing Music

The demo has a limited number of levels. Puzzledorf is a fun way to exercise your brain whilst immersing yourself in the vibrant, 2D art.

USER REVIEWS

"You can really see the effort the creator put into this game! The graphics are well-made, and the gameplay is similar to the box-pushing games I played on consoles as a kid! It’s full of nostalgia and is a game worth recommending!" - Vegemite

"This demo has a generous chunk of levels that show the difficulty progression, and really had me itching to play more at the end! Would definitely recommend the full game!" - Jacc

"Nice demo introducing the basic concept. Worth upgrading, the full game's puzzle get quite a bit more challenging." - Nandos

"Great, elegantly designed puzzles which are pleasantly challenging, with charming presentation." - AP

"Was surprised by how nice the atmosphere is in this with its ambience and art style. Very nice puzzle game." - Adam

"Fun and engaging puzzle game that introduces you to the mechanics found in the full game!" - Saga

"The gameplay is challenging and super satisfying. Highly recommend!" - tommyb9876
